#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long unsigned int prime[1000001];
void markMultiples(int a)
{
    long long unsigned int i = 2, num;
    while ( (num = i*a) <= 1000001 )
    {
        prime[num] = 1;
        ++i;
    }
}
 
void SieveOfEratosthenes()
{
   long long unsigned int i;
    prime[0] = 0;
    prime[1] = 0;
    prime[2] = 0;
    for (i = 2; i < 1000001; ++i)
    {
        if (prime[i] == 0)
        {
            markMultiples(i);
        }
    }
}
 
int main()
{
    long long unsigned int t,l,b,i,tempL,tempB;
    memset(prime, 0, 1000001);
    //memset(prime,0,1000001);
    SieveOfEratosthenes();
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>l>>b;
        if(!prime[l])
        {
            if(l==2 || l==3)
                l=1;
            else if(l==1)
            l=1;
            else
                l--;
        }
        if(!prime[b] && b!=1)
        {
            if(b==2 || b==3)
                b=1;
            else if(b==1)
            b=1;
            else
                b--;
        }
        cout<<l*b<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
